name: spimv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: A version of ~ spim with a distinct variable requirement instead of a bound-variable hypothesis. See ~ spimv1 and ~ spimvw for versions requiring fewer axioms. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-1993.)
